snippet: Business titans face the prospect of losing access to Western finance if the United States and Europe carry out threats of tougher sanctions against Moscow.
abstract: Russian business titans face prospect of losing access to Western finance if United States and Europe carry out threats of tougher sanctions against Moscow over crisis in Ukraine; anxiety over possible economic fallout has begun to radiate from business circles, and some wonder if Prime Min Vladimir V Putin has been clearly warned about magnitude of possible damage to economy.
lead_paragraph: Business titans face the prospect of losing access to Western finance if the United States and Europe carry out threats of tougher sanctions against Moscow.

headline.main: Titans in Russia Fear New Front in Ukraine Crisis
headline.print_headline: Titans in Russia Fear New Front in Ukraine Crisis
